command:
#!/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/bin/ruby

print case str = STDIN.read
  when /=>/;                 str.gsub(/:(\w+)[\s]+=>[\s]+/, '\1: ')
  when /(\w+):/;             str.gsub(/(\w+):(\s*(?:"(?:\\"|[^"])*"|'(?:\\'|[^'])*'|\w+\([^)]*\)|[^,]+))/, ":\\1 =>\\2")
  else;                      str
end
name: Toggle Ruby Hash 1.8/1.9 Syntax
